jobs.title: Social Media Lead
jobs.descriptionHtml:
🚨 We’re Hiring: Social Media Lead 🚨

Our DeFi client is looking for a Social Media Lead to be the voice of our clients’ brand. You’ll educate, engage, and entertain across all the right platforms.

💼 What you'll be doing..

📱 Own and execute our multi-channel social media strategy

🚀 Craft high-impact content for launches, updates & thought leadership

🔥 Grow and engage following on X and LinkedIn

🎨 Bring out your creative design skills to make every post look sharp

📊 Track performance, learn fast, iterate faster

✅ You’re a fit if you...

🧠 Have 3+ years in social or content marketing

🌐 Have a strong grasp of crypto culture

📈 Know how to grow and engage an audience from scratch

🎯 Think like a marketer, write like a creator

What's in it for you..

Work with crypto O.G's on cutting edge projects shaping the future of decentralized tech.

  • 💸 Competitive package

  • 🌴 Ample time off

  • 🏡 Fully remote & flexible hours

  • ✈️ Biannual team offsites per year

jobs.title: Smart Contracts Engineer
jobs.descriptionHtml:
Senior Smart Contracts Engineer

Are you the kind of engineer who reads EVM bytecode for fun? Do you get excited about designing contracts that billions in liquidity can safely rely on? If so, we’ve got a seat waiting for you.

We’re helping a web3 start up in DeFi build the next generation of lending and liquidity protocols. They’re backed by some of the most respected investors in Web3 and their mission is simple: make DeFi smooth, secure, and scalable.

What you’ll do:

  • Architect, implement, and audit advanced smart contracts (primarily Solidity).

  • Push the boundaries of on-chain design, gas optimization, and protocol security.

  • Collaborate with a world-class team of protocol engineers, economists, and DeFi nerds.

  • Ship code that actually moves markets.

What we’re looking for:

  • Deep experience with Solidity and smart contract ecosystems (DeFi experience = big plus).

  • Strong knowledge of EVM internals, security best practices, and testing frameworks.

  • Proven track record shipping contracts to mainnet.

  • Curiosity, creativity, and an eye for elegant design.

Why you’ll love it:

  • Competitive compensation + tokens.

  • Fully remote with a globally distributed team.

  • The chance to shape the future of DeFi at protocol level.

  • Work on problems where your code has immediate, visible impact.

If building protocols that redefine finance excites you, we’d love to hear from you.
